title: Events either in Turkmenistan or Involving a Turkmen
name: Events either in Turkmenistan or Involving a Turkmen
description: This data presents events either in Turkmenistan or involved a Turkmen citizen.

properties.summary of event: 03/01/2012: On Thursday, in Turkmenistan, border guard officer assisted in trafficking of precursor drugs prohibited on the territory of Turkmenistan.
properties.source title: Border Guard Officer, Assisted in Trafficking of Psychotropic Drugs, Arrested in Turkmenistan

properties.summary of event: 01/23/2012: On Monday, in Degan town, near Miram Shah, Federally Administered Tribal Areas, Pakistan, four Turkmenistan militants were killed in a drone strike when their vehicle was hit by two missiles. The identities of the militants were unknown.
properties.source title: US Predators Kill Four Militants in North Wazistan

properties.summary of event: 08/26/2010: On Thursday, in Bartella, Ninawa, Iraq, unknown assailants detonated an improvised explosive device (IED), Nezhat Ali; a member of Iraqâ€™s Turkmen Front was wounded.  A police officer and four civilians were also wounded.
properties.source title: Factbox - Security Developments in Iraq, Aug 26

properties.summary of event: 11/22/2009: On Sunday, in al Nour neighborhood in eastern Mosul, Iraq, unknown militants traveling in a car shot and killed Yawiz Ahmed Hussein, an official of the Turkmen Front, outside Hussein's residence.
properties.source title: Round-up of Daily Violence in Iraq-Sunday 22 November 2009

properties.summary of event: 08/07/2009: On Friday afternoon, at 1300, in Shirakhan, Ninawa, Iraq, a suicide bomber detonated a vehicle-borne improvised explosive device (VBIED) near a Shiite Turkmen mosque as worshippers were leaving a joint prayer and funeral service, killing 39 civilians, wounding between 140 and 276 others.
properties.source title: Toll from Mosul Mosque Blast on Rise

properties.summary of event: 06/12/2009: On Friday, in Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, a suicide bomber in a truck detonated a vehicle borne improvised explosive device (VBIED) outside a Shiite Turkmen mosque and killed 37 people and wounded 276.
properties.source title: Attacks on Shiites Kill Scores in Iraq

properties.summary of event: 05/14/2009: On Thursday, in central Tuz Khurmatu, Salah ad Din, Iraq, armed assailants fired on several stores, killing one Turkmen store owner, and wounding one other.
properties.source title: One Civilian Killed, One other Wounded in Armed Attack in Tozkhurmato, Salah ad Din, Iraq

properties.summary of event: 06/18/2010: On Friday, in Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, near the residence of a Turkmen provincial official, unidentified militants detonated a vehicle borne improvised explosive device (VBIED), which killed seven and wounded 61 civilians.
properties.source title: Car Bomb in Iraq's Restive North Kills Seven, Wounds Six

properties.summary of event: 04/11/2010: On Sunday, in Tozkhurmato, Salah ad Din, Iraq, assailants fired a rocket at an office of the Turkoman Front, damaging the political party office but causing no injuries.
properties.source title: One Political Party Office Damaged in Rocket Attack in Tozkhurmato, Salah ad Din, Iraq

properties.summary of event: 10/26/2009: On Monday morning, in Mosul, Ninawa, Iraq, an assailant riding a bicycle shot and killed a Turkoman.
properties.source title: Round-up of Daily Violence in Iraq - Monday 26 October 2009

properties.summary of event: 07/21/2010: On Wednesday, in Baghdad, Baghdad, Iraq, unknown assailants detonated a roadside improvised explosive device (RSIED), wounding two civilians near a Turkoman club on Palestine street.
properties.source title: Round-up of Daily Violence in Iraq - Wednesday 21 July, 2010

properties.summary of event: 04/13/2009: On Monday, in Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, unknown militants traveling in a vehicle shot and killed a Turkmen identified as Abdulrahman Aziz.
properties.source title: Round-up of Daily Violence in Iraq - Monday 13 April 2009

properties.summary of event: 06/20/2011: On Monday morning, in al-Mu'alimeen, Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, a Turkmen, Adwal Ali; was kidnapped in front of his residence. No ransom was demanded and the status of Ali was unknown.
properties.source title: Gunmen Kill Senior Official, Kidnap Two People in Iraq

properties.summary of event: 10/03/2010: On Sunday night, in the Mousili area of Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, unidentified assailants threw a grenade at an office belonging to the Turkmen party. Two guards were wounded in the attack.
properties.source title: FACTBOX-Security Developments in Iraq, Oct 4

properties.summary of event: 12/04/2009: On Friday, in Tuz Khormatu, Salah ad Din, Iraq, unidentified assailants shot and killed a Turkoman, Hazim Akbar; at his residence.
properties.source title: Round-up of Daily Violence in Iraq - Friday 4 December 2009

properties.summary of event: 08/07/2009: On Friday afternoon, at 1300, in Shirakhan, Ninawa, Iraq, a suicide bomber detonated a vehicle-borne improvised explosive device (VBIED) near a Shiite Turkmen mosque as worshippers were leaving a joint prayer and funeral service, killing 39 civilians, wounding between 140 and 276 others.
properties.source title: Sahwa Force Member Killed in Kirkuk

properties.summary of event: 05/12/2011: On Thursday, in Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, unknown militants fired a mortar at the home of a Turkman MP, Arshad al-Salehi; damaging the home and causing no casualties during the attack.
properties.source title: Two Killed, Seven Wounded in Iraq's Violence

properties.summary of event: 07/22/2010: On Thursday, in Ashkhabad, Ashgabat, Turkmenistan, authorities seized more than 230 kilograms of opium and a large quantity of cash in national and foreign currency. Nine people were arrested in the result of the operation.
properties.source title: Large Quantity of Drugs from Iran Seized in Turkmenistan

properties.summary of event: 11/28/2011: On Monday, in Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, unknown militants detonated three improvised explosive devices (IEDs) targeting the residence of Ali Mehdi Sadiq, a Turkmen Provincial Council member. The attack killed one civilian and wounded 13 others.
properties.source title: One Killed, 13 Wounded in Three Bomb Explosions in Kirkuk

properties.summary of event: 04/19/2012: On Thursday, in Baghdad, Baghdad, Iraq, unknown assailants detonated a vehicle borne improvised explosive device (VBIED) outside a Turkmen social club on Palestine Street killing two civilians and wounding six others.
properties.source title: Iraq Attacks Kill at Least 35

properties.summary of event: 12/10/2011: On Saturday, in Kirkuk, At Ta'mim, Iraq, a Shia Turkmen chemical specialist was killed when unknown militants attached a magnetic improvised explosive device (IED) to his vehicle.
properties.source title: Seven Killed in Iraq

properties.summary of event: 09/15/2009: On Tuesday morning, in Kirkuk, At Ta'min, Iraq, unkown militants stabbed and killed a Turkmen civilian.
properties.source title: One Civilian Killed in Assault in Kirkuk, At Ta'min, Iraq

properties.summary of event: 09/06/2009: On Sunday night, in the Wasti area of Kirkuk, At Ta'min, Iraq, unknown militants travelling in a vehicle fired upon and killed a Turkmen employee for the Northern Oil Company.
properties.source title: One Government Employee Killed in Armed Attack in Kirkuk, At Ta'min, Iraq
